articles.title: Google Unveils Next Generation Pixel Flagship
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Google is expected to launch the Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and possibly Pixel 10 Pro XL, featuring the Tensor G4 chip and enhanced camera systems. A new Pixel 9 Pro Fold is anticipated with improved durability (IP68 certification), and a Pixel 9a will continue the 'a' series tradition. Codenames 'zuma' and 'komoda' suggest potential for a foldable or larger-screen Pixel 10 variant.

articles.title: Yango launches ‘blended content marketing' influencer services
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Yango launched Yango Creator, a new division offering end-to-end influencer advertising services for brands. Eb Yusuf, General Manager, Strategy, Culture & Insights, oversees the new division, which will manage influencer strategy, creator selection, content development, campaign execution, and performance reporting.

articles.title: ClassNK launches ‘ClassNK Fleet Cost Simulation' Service
articles.author: system
articles.summary: ClassNK has launched 'ClassNK Fleet Cost Simulation', a new service within its 'ClassNK Transition Support Services'.

articles.title: AIStudios Launches Step-by-Step Guide to Creating Videos with a Free AI Video Generator
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Deepbrain offers AI video generator, a free AI tool that simplifies video creation through automation of editing, scripting, and visual selection. The tool is versatile, cost-effective, customizable and time-saving, suited for tutorials, marketing videos, and social media posts. The AI video generator assists users to create professional-quality videos accessible to everyone.

articles.title: 27 Dresses And Jumpsuits To Be Lazily But Put-Together
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Amazon and Target are offering a wide variety of clothing items including dresses, rompers, and jumpsuits. These items are available in multiple sizes and colors, with prices ranging from $17.97 to $55.30.

articles.title: Go Fund Yourself: Wellness and Style on Season 2, Episode 8 with Wild Tonic and Kozy Wheels
articles.summary: Wild Tonic, founded by Holly Skaggs, is introducing Jun, an ancient ferment made with honey and green tea, positioned as a premium, holistic experience. Kozy Wheels, LLC is launching beautifully designed wheelchair blankets, aiming to revolutionize adaptive accessories with a focus on style and dignity. Both companies are showcasing their products on Cheddar TV's 'Go Fund Yourself' to secure funding and mentorship.

articles.title: Ayesha Curry teams up with Garden Creamery for tropical lip care launch featuring ice creams and fruity flavors
articles.author: Global Sports Desk
articles.summary: Ayesha Curry's brand Sweet July Skin launched the Sweet July Lip Treatment, featuring tropical flavors. To commemorate the launch, Sweet July Skin collaborated with Garden Creamery to create Guava Jelly Swirl Sorbet and Lychees and Cream ice cream flavors inspired by the new lip treatment. The product, made with clean, vegan ingredients, aims to deliver smooth and moisturized lips.

articles.title: Vidnoz AI Unveils Product Avatar and Interactive Avatar, Redefining Marketing Video  Jul. 16, 2025 22:01
articles.summary: Vidnoz AI launched Product Avatar and Interactive Avatar. Product Avatar creates lifelike avatars holding product images for user-generated content and advertising videos. Interactive Avatar enables real-time customer engagement with natural speech interaction, multilingual communication, and dynamic facial expressions.

articles.title: Nissan to close two factories in Japan
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Nissan's AD wagon van production will end in October 2024, and the NV200 will cease production in March 2027. Nissan plans to introduce a new model to replace the NV200 by 2028.

articles.title: Brand First: How Retailers Win Hearts, Wallets & The Algorithm
articles.author: Jill Standish
articles.summary: L'Oréal Groupe is backing Noli, an AI-powered multi-brand beauty startup. Noli aims to personalize beauty product discovery by using AI diagnostics trained on over 1 million skin data points and product formulations. Noli delivers confident product picks to customers, addressing the issue of overwhelming choices and conflicting advice.

articles.title: Pacuzzi Releases 2025 Pacuzzi Skillet Steamer Innovation Amid Surging Demand for Multi-Use Cookware
articles.author: Pacuzzi
articles.summary: Pacuzzi has launched the Pacuzzi Skillet Steamer, a modular cookware product designed for space-saving and health-focused cooking. The Skillet Steamer combines steaming, sautéing, simmering, and searing functionalities into a single, compact solution, featuring a wide-base skillet with an integrated steaming compartment and a modular lid. The product targets urban dwellers, digital nomads, health-conscious eaters, and families seeking ergonomic and simplified cookware.

articles.title: Nissan Patrol Debuts in Egypt from EGP 8.99m at Exclusive North Coast Launch
articles.author: Daily News Egypt
articles.summary: Nissan Egypt launched the 2026 Nissan Patrol in the Egyptian market. The launch event was a private, high-profile event held in Egypt's North Coast. This marks the first official introduction of the Patrol to the Egyptian market.

articles.title: Meet The Rubik's Cube That's Part Console, Part Puzzle, And All Chaos
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The Rubik's WOWCube is a console-puzzle hybrid that has been introduced. It is described as weird but exciting, potentially generating consumer interest.

articles.title: Portion of Snow Monkey Sake profit to benefit Texas primate rescue
articles.author: John Magsam
articles.summary: Origami Sake released Snow Monkey Sake Remix, a new ready-to-drink canned beverage. The beverage supports monkeys.

articles.title: 37 Beauty Products Under $25 That'll Cast Some Serious Spells On Your Hair, Skin, And Nails
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article introduces various new beauty and skincare products. Highlights include a lip-plumping gloss with vitamin E and collagen, LilyAna Naturals retinol cream for collagen production and skin tone, retinol body lotion with vitamins A and E, and a moisturizing hair serum made from seven oils. Other featured items include Brazilian Bum Bum body cream, Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, and a piercing bump solution.

articles.title: Coffee Meets Bagel's Singpass check: Why I'll swipe right on that
articles.author: Lee Li Ying
articles.summary: Coffee Meets Bagel (CMB) has introduced Singpass authentication on June 9 to verify local users, aiming to combat fake profiles. This new feature retrieves users' NRIC number or Foreign Identification Number, date of birth, marital status, and gender from government records.  The purpose of this feature is to improve the safety and trust on the dating app.

articles.title: Bermuda laundry sheets shines at Marketplace
articles.author: Jessie Moniz Hardy
articles.summary: Sparkle, a new plastic-free laundry detergent, has become a top seller at The MarketPlace after just one month since launching. The product is ultra-concentrated and delivers eight times the cleaning power of conventional liquid detergent. The MarketPlace's president, Seth Stutzman, highlights Sparkle's success as proof of local innovation and community support.

articles.title: Feels Like a Steal: The Ultimate Black Dress for Summer
articles.author: Cortne Bonilla
articles.summary: Skims has launched the Milky sheer high-neck mididress, priced at $108. This little black dress features a built-in bodysuit, sleek mock neck, and A-line midi skirt made of stretch-polyamide material that can adapt to a changing body, making it suitable for various occasions and stages of life.

articles.title: 12 Best AI Porn Sites for Realistic & Custom Hentai Porn (2025)
articles.author: Charan Starion
articles.summary: Several AI porn sites, like CandyAI and ThotChat, are introduced, offering users the ability to generate customized pornographic content using AI. These platforms provide various features, including AI-generated roleplay, intimate AI dates (Intimate.ai), and nude AI image generation (Undress). Other platforms include LuvrAI, Pornx.ai, Kupid AI, Pleasur.ai, Hera Haven, Dreamgf.ai, INeedThis, and SoulGen, each with unique capabilities such as generating realistic AI girlfriends, sexting experiences, or editing tools, catering to diverse preferences within the adult entertainment sector.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner's Most Recent Thirst Traps Have Her Untying Her Thong Bikini
articles.summary: Kylie Jenner launched her new swimwear line, Khy, featuring a retro vibe. The launch was supported by sultry pictures of Jenner showcasing items from the new line, including white frilled tops, leopard bikini tops, and polka-dot bikini bottoms.

articles.title: Coveo Is Now Available in the New AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools Category
articles.author: Coveo Solutions Inc.
articles.summary: Coveo is now available within the new AI Agents and Tools category of the AWS Marketplace. This makes Coveo's search and AI capabilities accessible to AWS customers through their existing marketplace.

articles.title: Elon Musk's AI Grok Offers Sexualized Anime Bot, Accessible Even in Kid Mode
articles.summary: xAI launched new versions of its Grok chatbot, introducing AI characters like 'Bad Rudi' and 'Ani' powered by Grok 4. These characters offer unique interaction experiences, including sexualized content with 'Ani', however it sparked controversy due to concerns about emotional dependencies and offensive content. The company temporarily disabled Grok on July 8 due to the scandal.

articles.title: Vonage's AWS Partnership Aims to Amp AI-Based Voice Communications
articles.author: Meghan Hall
articles.summary: Vonage is integrating Amazon Nova Sonic, powered by AWS, into its cloud communications platform. This will allow Vonage's clients to deploy natural-sounding AI voice agents across customer service channels like phone conversations and mobile apps. The Nova Sonic integration aims to provide a more human-like customer service experience and increase efficiency.

articles.title: These 27 Products May Not Make You *Love* Cleaning, But They'll Make You Loathe It Less
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article features multiple newly introduced or highlighted cleaning products. The products include the Levoit air purifier, sink cleaner, Bissell Little Green carpet and upholstery cleaner, the Pink Stuff cleaning paste, Wet & Forget cleaner, the Baseboard Buddy, Cerama-Bryte cooktop cleaning kit, Bissell CleanView bagless vacuum, Hoover PowerDash carpet-cleaning machine and Puracy's all-in-one cleaning concentrate.

articles.title: Nissan Patrol Debuts in Egypt from EGP 8.99m at Exclusive North Coast Launch
articles.summary: Nissan Egypt launched the all-new 2026 Nissan Patrol in Egypt. The high-performance SUV was unveiled at an exclusive event on the North Coast. This marks the first official appearance of the new Patrol in the Egyptian market.

articles.title: Porsche Just Unveiled a Stealthy New Black Edition of the Taycan
articles.author: Erik Shilling
articles.summary: Porsche has introduced the Taycan Black Edition, a new special-edition variant of the all-electric Taycan. This edition features the Performance Battery Plus as standard, extending the car's range to 318 miles and output to 509 horsepower. Deliveries of the Taycan Black Edition are scheduled to begin this fall, with a price starting around $125,000.

articles.title: Castrol launches new MHP lubricant range for four-stroke medium speed engines
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Castrol launched its all-new Castrol MHP lubricant range.

articles.title: A New Opportunity Thrift Store celebrates grand opening in Lubbock
articles.author: Amy Anderson
articles.summary: A New Opportunity Thrift Store is celebrating its grand opening on July 18th and 19th with a 25 percent storewide discount and free lunch for shoppers. The thrift store offers a variety of items including furniture, home decor, clothing, and kids' items.

articles.title: Irish people fuming as Kerrygold launch new butter variation in the US
articles.summary: Kerrygold launched a new Cinnamon & Sugar butter flavor in the United States. The new product, coated in brown sugar and cinnamon, has garnered positive reactions from American customers, with many using it for baking and creating cinnamon butter loaves. The launch has led to demand from Irish customers for the product to be available in Ireland.

articles.title: I turned my Android into a Windows Phone, and I don't think I'll go back
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Square Home, a third-party Android launcher, is introduced as a way to replicate the Windows Phone home screen experience. The launcher allows users to customize tiles, use Live Tiles for notifications, and provides a unique app drawer. It offers a free version and premium features with a 14-day trial for additional customization.

articles.title: SEE: New Aldi grocery stores coming soon to Port Orange, Ormond Beach
articles.author: Clayton Park
articles.summary: Aldi is preparing to open new grocery store locations at 4025 S. Nova Road, 5500 S. Williamson Blvd. in Port Orange, and 353 W. Granada Blvd. in Ormond Beach. The store at 5500 S. Williamson Blvd. is part of the new Shoppes at Summer Trees retail plaza and is set to open at the end of the month.

articles.title: Taco Bell launches a brand new limited-edition menu
articles.author: Colette Bennett
articles.summary: Taco Bell is launching a new 'Luxe Value Menu' in the Indianapolis area starting July 16, featuring five debut items, including a Mini Taco Salad and Salted Caramel Churros. Additionally, a limited-edition Sweet Chipotle BBQ sauce is being introduced, which can be added to Crispy Chicken Tacos and Burritos.

articles.title: WATCH: Aldi's newest store is gearing up for opening day in Port Orange, Florida
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing a new grocery store at the Shoppes at Summer Trees in Port Orange. A sneak peek of the new Aldi store is available.

articles.title: Starbucks finally reveals its ‘secret menu' with new app-exclusive drinks
articles.author: Andrea Margolis
articles.summary: Starbucks has officially launched its 'secret menu' drinks accessible through the Starbucks mobile app, starting July 14. The new menu features four unique drinks: 'Cookies On Top,' 'Dragonfruit Glow-Up,' 'Lemon, Tea & Pearls,' and 'Just Add White Mocha'. Starbucks Rewards members can easily order these customized drinks through the app, with the offerings being periodically updated.

articles.title: Carl's Jr. launches new burger! What does it include and when will it be available?
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Carl's Jr. has launched the Queso Crunch Burger, featuring a flame-grilled beef patty topped with hot creamy cheese, Pepper Jack cheese, pico de gallo, and seasoned chips. The company also introduced a new line of frozen beverages, including Frozen Strawberry Lemonade and Frozen Blue Sourberry. These new products are available for a limited time at participating Carl's Jr. locations, supported by a marketing campaign featuring Alix Earle and Paris Hilton.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sale: Save Up To 60% On Editor-Approved Beds
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 60% off top-rated mattress models. This sale provides an opportunity to upgrade to one of their editor-favorite designs at a reduced price.

articles.title: Ayesha Curry teams up with Garden Creamery for tropical lip care launch featuring ice creams and fruity flavors
articles.author: Global Sports Desk
articles.summary: Ayesha Curry's Sweet July Skin has launched the new 'Sweet July Lip Treatment,' a tropical-themed lip care product. The product is available in Guava Jelly, Lychee Jelly, and Essential (unscented) flavors and features clean, vegan ingredients. To commemorate the launch, Sweet July Skin collaborated with Garden Creamery to introduce Guava Jelly Swirl Sorbet and Lychees and Cream ice cream flavors inspired by the new lip treatment.

articles.title: Fahadh Faasil still uses a minimalistic keypad phone, but what's behind its whopping ₹10 lakh price tag?
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Vertu, formerly a luxury arm of Nokia, offers the Ascent Retro Classic, a luxury mobile phone model crafted with titanium, sapphire crystal, and leather. The phone sells for $11,920 and caters to celebrities and high-net-worth individuals seeking fashionable and functional devices.

articles.title: 34 Products With Such High Ratings It's Almost Obnoxious
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Essence introduces mascara for lash enhancement. Sol de Janeiro launches Brazilian Bum Bum Cream for skin hydration. NYX presents cruelty-free butter gloss for lips. COSRX unveils Snail Mucin Repairing Essence for skin repair.

articles.title: Vax HomePro Detect Pet-Design cordless vacuum review: A pet lover's dream
articles.author: Ellie Davis
articles.summary: Vax vacuum offers a simple and effective cleaning solution without unnecessary smart features. It includes a power button, a boost mode for increased suction, and an eco mode for extended cleaning sessions.

articles.title: Samsung Members Connect 2025: A Global Launch in New York
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7, featuring the next chapter of Galaxy AI.  Samsung is also introducing features like Enhanced Bixby Capabilities, Advanced Camera Features, and SmartThings Ecosystem Expansion. Community feedback on One UI 6.1 will shape future updates.

articles.title: The next Made By Google event (better known as the Pixel launch) is set for August 20
articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.summary: Google will host an event on August 20 to launch new Pixel phones, watches, and buds. The expected products include the Pixel 10 flagship phones, Pixel Watch 4, and new Pixel Buds. Google is also potentially working on Pixelsnap, a magnetic charging system, along with Qi2 accessories.

articles.title: How often should you wash a duvet?
articles.author: Jess Robson
articles.summary: Silk & Snow's brand ambassador Lacey Russell provides guidance on caring for duvet covers, recommending washing them regularly with natural laundry soap in cool or warm cycles to maintain fabric integrity. The article also recommends Silk & Snow Flax Linen Duvet Cover, along with other brands of duvet inserts.

articles.title: ‘Need to try this' cry cleaning fans over Fabulosa's new summer range that makes your home smell like £24 Sol de Janeiro
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Fabulosa launched a new scent called "Summer Crush" as part of their "Your Sol Mate collection". The scent, inspired by Sol de Janeiro, is available in products like multi-purpose cleaner and fabric freshener, with prices starting from £1. These products can be found at The Range.

articles.title: SAMBAZON Opens First New York Location in Brooklyn with Free Açaí Bowls for Guests
articles.author: SAMBAZON
articles.summary: SAMBAZON opened its first franchise location in Brooklyn, New York, offering Açaí bowls, smoothies, and snacks. To celebrate, SAMBAZON hosted a grand opening event with free Açaí bowls for the first 200 guests.

articles.title: Labra AI Agent is now available in the new AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools category
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Labra has announced the availability of Labra AI Agent. Labra AI Agent is now available in the new AI Agents and Tools category of AWS Marketplace. Labra is providing customers with Labra AI Agent through AWS Marketplace.

articles.title: You.com Announces Availability of Web Search & News API in the New AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools Category
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: You.com has made its Web Search & News API available in the AI Agents and Tools category of AWS Marketplace. This allows customers to discover, buy, and deploy You.com's real-time web search and news API using their AWS accounts, accelerating agent and agentic workflow development.

articles.title: Sonatype Solutions Now Available in the New AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools category
articles.author: Sonatype
articles.summary: Sonatype has made its entire product suite, including Nexus Repository Cloud, available in the new AI Agents and Tools category in AWS Marketplace. This allows Amazon Web Services (AWS) customers to discover, buy, and deploy Sonatype's open source and AI management solutions using their AWS accounts. The suite also includes software composition analysis, malicious code protection and Nexus Repository.

articles.title: AlphaSense AI Search and Market Intelligence Platform Now Available in New AWS AI Marketplace Agents and Tools Category
articles.author: Alpha Sense
articles.summary: AlphaSense has announced the availability of its AI platform in the new AI Agents and Tools category of AWS Marketplace. This allows AWS customers to easily find, purchase, and implement AlphaSense, speeding up the creation of AI agents and agentic workflows.

articles.title: Honeycomb Announces Availability of MCP in the New AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools Category
articles.author: Honeycomb
articles.summary: Honeycomb has released its Hosted Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server in the AWS Marketplace. Customers can now discover, buy, and deploy Honeycomb's MCP server via their AWS accounts, as part of the new AI Agents and Tools category.

articles.title: CloudBees announces the availability of the CloudBees MCP Server, the latest innovation behind CloudBees Unify, in the new AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools category
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: CloudBees launched its Modern Context Protocol (MCP) Server, a core service for CloudBees Unify, on the AWS Marketplace. The MCP server facilitates real-time access to CI/CD pipeline, testing, and security data, enabling teams to trigger workflows and collaborate across environments.

articles.title: You deserve a treat: Get Dash's viral ice cream maker for $22 at Amazon 🍦
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Dash is promoting the Dash My Mug Ice Cream Maker, a single-serve ice cream machine known for its small design. The Dash ice cream maker can create ice creams, sorbets and other frozen yogurt creations in a matter of just minutes and is currently restocked at Amazon and on sale.

articles.title: Yakult XO Surpasses 5 Million Cumulative Sales
articles.author: Senior Editor
articles.summary: Yakult Honsha Co., Ltd. launched Yakult XO, a premium probiotic drink, which has surpassed 5 million cumulative sales by July 16, 2025. Yakult XO distinguishes itself with an increased concentration of Lactobacillus casei Shirota and the addition of xylo-oligosaccharides (XO) compared to traditional Yakult, leading to enhanced probiotic delivery and targeted health benefits.

articles.title: Newly launched startup Edgedive turns customer feedback into meaningful business insights
articles.author: Shubhangi Chowdhury
articles.summary: Edgedive, a startup, introduces a platform designed to consolidate customer feedback from various sources into a single location. The platform aims to help teams understand customer sentiment, identify areas for improvement, and prioritize development efforts based on customer needs. Edgedive helps businesses automate 'Voice of the Customer' programs.

articles.title: Burger King debuts new sandwich, created by Whopper fanatics
articles.author: Liesel Nygard
articles.summary: Burger King has launched the 'BBQ Brisket Whopper' and 'Whopper Jr.', new menu items inspired by customer suggestions. The 'BBQ Brisket Whopper' features slow-cooked BBQ brisket, onions, American cheese, sweet BBQ sauce, beef patty, lettuce, tomato, and mayo. Burger King is also launching the 'Whopper By You' platform, allowing customers to submit their own Whopper creations.

articles.title: Lamiso.ch Launches 'Putz‑Blog' for Smarter, Eco‑Friendly Cleaning
articles.summary: Lamiso, a Swiss household brand, has launched its new Putz-Blog on lamiso.ch. The blog is designed to provide expert cleaning tips, sustainable hacks, and product insights to its customers, enhancing their experience with Lamiso's products. Lamiso aims to promote smarter, greener cleaning practices in Switzerland through this new service.

articles.title: Ready or Not Guide – 15 Essential Tips and Tricks
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Void Interactive's Ready or Not, a tactical first-person shooter, has launched on Xbox Series X/S and PS5 after its PC early access phase ended in December 2023. Players now have control to bring order to the chaos objective.

articles.title: NYT Strands Answers July 16: Theme, hints and Spangram to solve the Wednesday puzzle
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: NYT Strands, a word puzzle game, had a theme of "Tech accessories" on July 16, 2025. The puzzle included words like CASE, SPEAKER, STAND, STYLUS, CHARGER, KEYBOARD, and FOLIO as solutions related to tablets and accessories. The spangram for the puzzle was TABLET.

articles.title: 5 Products That Made My New Home Feel Like a Home
articles.summary: Roku is promoting its Streaming Stick Plus as a user-friendly device for accessing digital content and enhancing home entertainment. The Roku Streaming Stick HD 2025 is available at a 37% discount, making it an affordable streaming option. Stadler Form Jasmine diffuser allows intensity control for home scenting.

articles.title: Google's new AI feature helps Gen Zers who are afraid to make a phone call
articles.author: Grace Snelling
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI search feature that uses AI-powered calling to assist users in checking pricing and service availability at local businesses.  The feature is designed to make everyday tasks easier by acting on behalf of the user, targeting categories like beauty, wellness, auto maintenance, pet, and professional services. This new tool allows users to search for local businesses and have an AI bot contact them to gather information, which saves the user from needing to make the calls themselves.

articles.title: 以'用戶驗證'替代'流量轟炸'，內容社區或成為科技領域思想策源地丨一克商評
articles.author: 新浪網
org: 阿里科學家獲國際基礎科學大會'前沿科學獎'
Asusa豆與國際知名香水品牌法國嬌蘭跨界聯名正式官宣，於今夏重磅打造
articles.summary: Hema launched a turmeric, ginger, and lemon juice as the headliner of its new HPP shot series. This series utilizes fresh ingredients and HPP pasteurization to preserve nutrients and flavor, marking Hema's exploration of HPP technology in the healthy beverage sector. Hema aims to continue exploring HPP technology for other healthy drinks like cold-brewed tea, signaling their entry into the health beverage market.

articles.title: Floating, moonwalking car spins heads in Puerto Banús
articles.author: Adam Woodward
articles.summary: BYD's luxury division has unveiled the Yangwang U8, a plug-in hybrid 4x4 featuring capabilities like floating on water, performing "Tank Turns," and boasting a luxurious interior with six HD screens, Nappa leather, and a Dynaudio sound system. The U8, unveiled in 2023 in China, has a 1,000 km range and can accelerate from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.6 seconds.

articles.title: Sound Advice: Get blown away by electric air duster
articles.author: Don Lindich
articles.summary: Wolfbox has launched the MF50 Electric Air Duster, a versatile mini blower/duster, priced at $39.99 (currently $29.98 with code TURBOFAN) on Amazon. The MF50 features three power settings, USB-C recharging, and attachments for modifying airflow.

articles.title: Mahindra Vision S teased again: Design details revealed ahead of August debut
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Mahindra and Mahindra will unveil the Mahindra Vision S concept SUV on August 15. The Vision S is likely to preview the first electric version of the Scorpio N and features a bold, upright front, sculpted bonnet with side scoops, and off-road-focused tires. The company will also unveil the Vision SXT—an electric pickup truck expected to share space with the Global Pickup concept in the future.

articles.title: LambdaTest Enhances Detox Testing with Powerful Cross-Platform Capabilities
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LambdaTest, through its HyperExecute platform, now natively supports Detox, an end-to-end testing framework for React Native applications. This integration allows developers to execute Detox tests rapidly on Android real devices and iOS simulators directly from their local environments using HyperExecute's infrastructure.

articles.title: Just 34 Newer Products You'll Feel Clever For Discovering *Before* They Gain Internet Fame
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Laneige introduces Neo Blurring Powder for matte skin with a natural glow. Anua launches Azelaic Acid Serum to combat redness and blemishes, while Good Molecules releases Pineapple Exfoliating Powder to soften and brighten skin. Ninja introduces the portable Crispi Air Fryer for on-the-go cooking and reduced dishwashing.

articles.title: Yango Ads unveils smarter monetisation tools for app developers in Middle East
articles.author: DXB
articles.summary: Yango Ads, a division of Yango Group, has introduced new monetization opportunities for mobile app publishers through an updated SDK featuring smarter ad formats. These advancements aim to increase in-app revenue and improve ad performance, with new interactive formats already showing increased user engagement and click-through rates. The updated SDK facilitates integration with over 50 DSPs, expanding access to global demand.

articles.title: Shoppers rush to save £140 on 'perfect' Emma mattress in fast-selling deal
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering refurbished or new Emma Original Memory Foam Mattresses at reduced prices. Simba Sleep is selling their Hybrid Mattress, which includes free hybrid pillows and a mattress protector. Amazon is selling the dosleeps 10.2 Inch Double Mattress 9-Zone Pocket Sprung Mattress at a discounted price.

articles.title: POCO F7 Pro: AMOLED, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 & 6000mAh!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Poco launched the F7 Pro smartphone, which is available on AliExpress. The Poco F7 Pro features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, a 6.67-inch 2K AMOLED display, and a 50MP camera, and it is priced competitively at €432.37. The phone has a 6000 mAh battery with 90W hypercharging.

articles.title: Acer unveils AI-powered future with exclusive Middle East preview
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: Products were recently launched at Computex. A special preview for media and influencers in the UAE followed the Computex launch.

articles.title: LG launches next-gen OLED and QNED TVs at Rs 74,990
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: LG Electronics India introduced its 2025 OLED evo and QNED evo smart TVs with advanced AI features. The OLED evo series includes the Alpha 11 AI Processor Gen2 for image and sound enhancements, while the QNED evo lineup features Mini LED backlighting paired with Dynamic QNED Colour. Pricing starts at Rs 149,990 for the OLED evo C5 series and Rs 119,990 for the QNED evo TVs.

articles.title: MarTech+: Making discovery intuitive and seamless
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Myntra launched Glamstream, a shoppable video streaming service, to enhance fashion discovery. Elon Musk introduced Grok AI chatbot with anime girl companion Ani for $30 per month. These initiatives represent strategic moves towards immersive experiences.

articles.title: Shoppers say this shower gel takes them back to being on holiday
articles.author: Beth Mahoney Shopping Writer
articles.summary: Nivea Love Sunshine Shower Gel, known for its summer scent similar to Nivea sunscreen, is available for £5.88 on Amazon. The shower gel is formulated with aloe vera for added hydration, along with Nivea's iconic sun cream fragrance. The Treaclemoon Brazilian Love Shower & Bath Gel is available at Boots for £1.99 a bottle.

articles.title: China's open-source AI is a catalyst for global progress: NVIDIA CEO--China Economic Net
articles.author: Wu Siya
articles.summary: NVIDIA plans to resume sales of H20 chips in China and introduce a new GPU designed for the Chinese market. This announcement was made by CEO Jensen Huang at the 3rd China International Supply Chain Expo (CISCE).

articles.title: Vystar Launches New Website and Unveils Brand Refresh www.vytex.com
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Vystar Corporation launched a newly-redesigned website www.vytex.com. The launch aligns with the company's new brand refresh and overall digital strategy.

articles.title: Roblox reveals new licensing platform with Sega, Netflix, and more on-board
articles.author: Games Industry
articles.summary: Roblox introduced a new licensing platform to enable intellectual properties.

articles.title: If You're Sweating Buckets, Check Out These 29 Products That'll Help Keep You Cool
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: The article presents an array of cooling and heat-relief products designed for the summer season. These include items like cooling mattress pads and bamboo sleep sets for comfortable sleep, personal umbrellas and body washes for sun protection, portable and handheld fans for personal cooling, and misters and evaporative towels for outdoor comfort. Additionally, the selection includes items like cooling blankets and sheets, eye sticks, and even car fans and bra liners designed for heat relief.

articles.title: Shiplo Launches to Replace Outdated Shipping with Faster, More Intelligent Logistics
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: A new AI-powered platform aims to improve supply chain efficiency. The platform offers faster shipping, lower costs, and simpler operations, focusing on a smarter and more sustainable supply chain.

articles.title: Unlock exclusive summer discounts on the Step Forward Luton app and be in with a chance to win a £200 gift card
articles.author: Laura Redmond
articles.summary: The Step Forward Luton app launched on July 16th, offering users a guide to local businesses and exclusive discounts. Users who download and register on the app between July 16th and September 30th have a chance to win a £200 shopping gift card. The app is available on both iOS and Android.

articles.title: Unlock AI Coding Power: Run Assistants on RTX AI PCs for Free
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NVIDIA launched the GeForce RTX 50 Series laptops, featuring specialized AI technologies. NVIDIA also launched the 'Plug and Play: project G-Assist Plug-In Hackathon' to develop custom plug-ins for Project G-Assist, an experimental AI assistant.

articles.title: Make Every Shower Count With Dove's Advance Serum Body Wash Collection
articles.summary: Dove has launched its new Serum Body Wash collection, which includes different variants containing active skincare ingredients like Vitamin C, AHAs, and Salicylic Acid. These body washes aim to provide the body with the same level of care as the face, addressing concerns like dullness, roughness, and breakouts.

articles.title: Next's £32 'non iron' kaftan linen beach dress that's 'very comfy in hot weather'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next introduced a new 'non iron' kaftan linen beach dress priced at £32. The dress is available in mini and midi lengths in four colors and various sizes. Shoppers describe the dress as comfortable and easy to care for.

articles.title: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas warns aspiring entrepreneurs: 'Big tech will copy anything that works'
articles.summary: Perplexity launched an 'answer engine' chatbot with real-time web browsing in December 2022. OpenAI is reportedly developing its own web browser, aiming to integrate chat and internet navigation.

articles.title: Morrisons shoppers question 'who signed this off?' as new store feature revealed
articles.author: Emilia Kettle
articles.summary: Morrisons has introduced 'cleaning robots' in its stores. These large, blue machines use AI and computer vision to navigate stores while maintaining a safe distance from shoppers. The robots are intended to improve cleanliness.

articles.title: moto g96 5G Goes on Sale Today – A True Bestseller Upgrade Disrupting India's Sub-Rs. 20K Market with a 144Hz 3D Curved Display & 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C, at an Unbelievable Price of Rs. 17,999
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Motorola launched the moto g96 5G smartphone, featuring a 144Hz 3D curved pOLED display, a 50MP OIS Sony LYTIA™ 700C camera, and a Snapdragon® 7s Gen 2 processor. The phone is available for purchase on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores starting at Rs. 17,999.

articles.title: ‘A World of Endless Possibilities': Stephen Okwara Hails New Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Boluwatife Enome
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its latest foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, along with the SE Fan Edition variant. These new devices feature cutting-edge AI capabilities, upgraded camera systems (up to 300 megapixels), a thinner design (4.2mm), and improved durability, including a stronger hinge and ceramic-coated screen. The devices are available in Samsung-authorized stores in Nigeria with various payment options and pre-order offers.

articles.title: Revlon Canada Celebrates 'Most Trusted' Credentials by Turning National Lipstick Day into a Month-Long Celebration
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Revlon is celebrating its lip products with exclusive deals and a pop-up event in Toronto from July 25-27. At the pop-up, attendees can sample Revlon's new Glimmer Gloss and Glimmer Lip Oil, enhancing the brand's existing ColorStay and Super Lustrous lines.

articles.title: Revlon Canada Celebrates ‘Most Trusted' Credentials by Turning National Lipstick Day into a Month-Long Celebration
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Revlon is celebrating National Lipstick Day by offering exclusive deals on select lip products throughout July. A consumer pop-up will be held in Toronto on July 25-27 to promote Revlon's lip products and innovative formulas.

articles.title: Guardforce AI to Launch New Tech-Focused Strategy for Thai Subsidiary to Drive Future Growth ...
articles.author: Guardforce AI Co.
articles.summary: Guardforce AI's subsidiary, Guardforce Cash Solutions Security (Thailand) Company Limited (GFCS), will launch its updated 'Smart Cash Solutions' and 'Smart Retail Solutions' during a rebranding event on July 25, 2025, in Bangkok, Thailand. Olivia Wang, Chairwoman and CEO of Guardforce AI, will outline the company's strategy to position GFCS as both a secure logistics provider and a trusted technology partner.

articles.title: On My Mind: Zitomer Firkins and Khaite Tees
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: The author is considering several new products: Dimepiece's Coração Bobo swimsuits with Tan-Through fabrication, Norma Kamali swimdress, Nike Aqua Turfs water shoes, Khaite Devra T-shirt. She also highlights Bourgine's collection interpreting 'French regional costume in the early 19th century' and Indress' ostrich-feathers pin. She is also purchasing Maria de la Rosa socks. All the mentioned products are either prototypes, newly launched or a new purchase of the author.

articles.title: Serta Simmons Bedding Launches Serta® Perfect Day® Mattress in a Box Collection
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Serta Simmons Bedding (SSB) has launched the Serta® Perfect Day® Mattress in a Box (MIB) collection. The collection includes wrapped coil mattresses with Box-to-Bed in Seconds™ convenience and ranges from a 7" firm model at $199 to a 16" plush pillow top at $1,099. The mattresses feature breathable materials, cushioning foam, and 3-Zoned Body Support.

articles.title: These $1 Apiece Space-Saving Clothes Hangers Are a Closet Hack
articles.author: Jeaneen Russell
articles.summary: Zober Non-Slip Pants Hangers are a space-saving solution for closets, featuring an open-ended design for easy access and a non-slip coating. The hangers are durable and can hold heavy denim, helping to organize and neaten pants collections. Consumers have given five-star reviews for exceptional durability and space-saving ability.

articles.title: Serta Simmons Bedding Launches Serta® Perfect Day® Mattress in a Box Collection
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Serta Simmons Bedding (SSB) launched the new Serta® Perfect Day® Mattress in a Box (MIB) collection. The MIB collection is designed to deliver refreshing sleep, zoned support, and Serta-quality comfort.

articles.title: This powerful Dyson Vacuum is over $100 off in limited-time deal as good as Black Friday: 'Makes my carpet and rugs look brand new'
articles.author: NISHKA DHAWAN
articles.summary: Dyson Ball Animal 3 vacuum cleaner, a product with five tools, is on sale at QVC for 20 percent off; customers can snag an additional $20 off with code WELCOME20 at checkout. The vacuum features detangling technology, three cleaning modes, and a washable filter, designed to block up to 99.97 percent of dust, dirt, and bacteria particles.

articles.title: New McDonald's restaurant opens in Gosport in boost for the town centre after an absence of more than six years
articles.author: Kelly Brown
articles.summary: McDonald's has opened a new restaurant in Gosport, featuring 65 seats, self-ordering kiosks, and table service. The restaurant incorporates McDonald's 'Convenience of the Future' program, providing efficient service and sustainable innovations, targeting net zero emissions by 2030. This opening creates around 100 new jobs.

articles.title: Google's New 'AI Mode' Is Live—Here's What It Means For PR
articles.author: Nancy Marshall
articles.summary: Google launched AI Mode, a new search feature utilizing AI to provide conversational answers, similar to ChatGPT. This impacts PR strategies as AI will be used to generate responses. Professionals should optimize online content to influence AI-generated responses, especially by updating websites and social media for improved visibility.

articles.title: The Shift From Assistance To Autonomy
articles.author: Anand Subbaraj
articles.summary: Zuper is introducing 'Service as a Software', an AI-driven approach to field service that actively participates in service delivery. This new model autonomously handles tasks like scheduling and job updates.  Zuper's new solution promises benefits like faster resolution and improved efficiency in field service operations.

articles.title: Why are cruelty-free and vegan beauty no longer buzzwords?
articles.summary: Insight Cosmetics' Sales and Marketing Director defines cruelty-free and vegan beauty products, highlighting the distinctions in animal-derived ingredients. MARS Cosmetics notes the existence of vegetarian beauty products with ethically sourced ingredients. Glam21 emphasizes the growing adoption of cruelty-free and vegan practices as a standard to build consumer trust and gain a competitive edge. Shryoan Cosmetics highlights the importance of certifications and transparency in ethically formulated products.

articles.title: Shoppers begging for more colours of summer dress that 'hangs beautifully'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg
articles.summary: Boden is offering a 50% discount on the Ponte Puff Sleeve Tea Dress, now priced at £65. White Stuff is offering up to 60% off on dresses, including the Iris Linen Notch Neck Midi Dress at £42 and the Rua Jersey Shirt Dress Midi at £33. Nobody's Child has reduced the Blue Tile Print Floral Starlight Midi Dress to £60 and the Black Floral Check Joanna Midi Dress to £44.50.

articles.title: Neighbourhood app Nextdoor relaunches with new brand and product design
articles.author: Rob Alderson
articles.summary: Nextdoor is relaunching with a new product design and brand identity, focusing on connecting local communities. The new design incorporates three pillars: News, Alerts, and Faves, utilizing AI for local recommendations. This relaunch aims to make neighborhood information more actionable and relevant.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy Z Flip7
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has introduced the Galaxy Z Flip7, a compact AI phone featuring a new FlexWindow and enhanced Galaxy AI capabilities. The phone boasts a larger battery and display in a more compact form, along with new color options including Blue Shadow, Jetblack, Coral-red and Mint. The Galaxy Flip7 FE is available in Black or White.

articles.title: FG to launch agency to support local innovators
articles.author: NAN
articles.summary: The Federal Government plans to establish a National Design and Development Agency to support innovators in refining concepts, securing funding, and accessing markets. Innov8 Hub, having expanded to 15 departments, incubates start-ups, and focuses on bringing real-life solutions to the market, contributing to creating 7,000 jobs nationwide.

articles.title: Steam Deck Outperforms Windows Handhelds in Latest Tests
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft and Asus have launched the ROG Xbox Ally X, a handheld gaming PC, aiming to compete with Valve's Steam Deck. The ROG Xbox Ally X offers an 'Xbox-like experience' and aims for performance parity with the Steam Deck, potentially offering broader game access and enhanced performance. It will support games beyond the Xbox ecosystem, possibly including titles from Steam and Battle.net.

articles.title: Transforming Loyalty into Playful Engagement
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Blings is launching a marketing technology platform that offers hyper-personalized, interactive video content, enabling real-time customization without pre-rendering. Blings also introduces a gamified loyalty program leveraging digital collectibles called 'Blings' to incentivize customer behavior and enhance engagement compared to traditional points-based systems. Several brands like Starbucks, Nike and Sephora have implemented 'Blings' achieving higher engagement and increased sales.

articles.title: Top 10 Mobile App Development Companies in New York 2025
articles.summary: Several companies, including Hyperlink InfoSystem, IBM, Deloitte Digital, HData Systems, Accenture, and EPAM Systems, are leading mobile app development in New York in 2025. These companies offer services ranging from custom app development and AI-powered solutions to cloud migration and digital transformation, catering to diverse industries and focusing on scalability, security, and user experience.

articles.title: Maximize Savings: Unboxing Days and Prime Day 2025 Deals Guide
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Amazon Mexico has launched pre-orders for the upcoming Pokémon Legends: Z-A for the Nintendo Switch. The pre-orders, ending on July 21st, include free shipping and the possibility of next-day delivery. This release reinforces the Nintendo Switch's position as a platform for major gaming releases.

articles.title: The MicroPC 2—Like a Laptop Made a Baby With a Nintendo Switch
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: GPD (GamePad Digital) is launching the GPD MicroPC 2, a handheld computer with a 7" rotatable screen, through an Indiegogo campaign. Backers on Indiegogo can save 18% off the $607 retail price, bringing the sale price to $495. Estimated shipping is set for September 2025.

articles.title: LG Unveils Latest Oled Evo and Qned Evo Tv in the Gulf, Redefining Home Entertainment Standards
articles.summary: LG Electronics has introduced its 2025 OLED evo and QNED evo TV lineups in the Gulf region. The OLED evo models, like the G5 and M5, utilize the α11 AI Processor 4K Gen2 for enhanced picture quality and brightness, while the QNED evo TVs feature Nano Technology for a wide color gamut. These new TVs also incorporate AI features like AI Voice ID and AI Picture & Sound Wizard for a personalized user experience.

articles.title: Pfeiffer Vacuum+Fab Solutions Launches New Global Website
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Pfeiffer Vacuum+Fab Solutions has launched a new global website. This website includes new features aimed at providing an informative and user-centered online experience.

articles.title: Aldi launches insanely cheap robot vacuum that cleans and mops - rivalling some of the best budget models around
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its £99.99 robot vacuum with 3,000pa suction and mopping capabilities, available from July 13th. The article also highlights robot vacuum options from eufy (15C MAX, G50), Roborock (Q7 M5), and Ultenic (D10), each with varying suction power, features like anti-tangle brushes, and mopping functions.

articles.title: Decoding Ad Server: The Martech Glossary by ETBrandEquity
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: FocaLink Media Services (later AdKnowledge) launched the first central ad server. Shortly after, NetGravity released the first local ad server. DoubleClick's DART ad server gained widespread adoption, leading to its acquisition by Google and eventual rebranding as Google Ad Manager, now a widely used platform.

articles.title: Bloomsbury profits on track amid strong Sarah J Maas sales
articles.author: Henry Saker-Clark
articles.summary: The company anticipates positive sales following the upcoming launch of JK Rowling's Pocket Potter series. They also have a strong list of further releases planned for the remainder of the year, indicating more products are soon to be introduced.

articles.title: LG Household & Health Care's premium laundry detergent brand PiJi recently launched a new produc..
articles.author: Kim Hyo-Hye
articles.summary: LG Household & Health Care's brand PiJi launched the 'Moraxella Smell Removal Capsule Detergent,' a new product combining odor and stain removal. The product, designed to combat laundry odors caused by Moraxella bacteria, quickly sold out its initial home shopping broadcast volume. PiJi also introduced a new AI-driven advertisement featuring table tennis player Shin Yu-bin to promote the product.

articles.title: Up to 60% off premium beauty brands Amazon
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Amazon offers discounts up to 60% on premium beauty brands including Bedhead by TIGI's Resurrection Shampoo and Conditioner Set, Elizabeth Arden's Visible Difference Moisture Cream, Lancôme's Génifique Dual Repair Serum, and EVE LOM's Original Balm Cleanser. MySweetSmile introduces a new teeth whitening range designed to prepare individuals for wedding photos.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Chantilly's Bull Run Plant hits 1 million-ton milestone
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Luck Stone and Caterpillar have achieved a significant milestone at the Bull Run Plant in Chantilly, autonomously hauling 1 million tons of aggregates. This collaboration demonstrates the potential of transformative technology in the aggregates industry.

articles.title: Pixel 10 Pro Fold leak: Google's upcoming foldable may beat Samsung with full dust-proof design
articles.summary: Google's upcoming Pixel 10 Pro Fold is expected to feature an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance, improved display brightness up to 3,000 nits, a new Tensor G5 chip with 16GB RAM, and a larger 5,015mAh battery. While the camera setup may remain similar to the previous model, storage options may reach up to 1TB.

articles.title: Oneplus launches nord 5 series in Bangladesh
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its Nord 5 Series in Bangladesh, including the Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 models. The Nord 5 features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, a 6800mAh battery, and 50MP cameras, while the Nord CE 5 includes a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 APEX chipset and a 7100mAh battery. All Made-in-Bangladesh units are covered by a Lifetime Display Warranty against vertical line issues.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: New market replaces Grillo's site in New Baltimore
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Litaly, a new market offering Mediterranean and Italian foods, is set to open in New Baltimore. It will replace the former Grillo's International Market site. The initial plan for the site included a gas station, but that was changed based on public feedback.

articles.title: The evolution of foldable phones in eight devices
articles.author: Shouvik Das
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone with an 8-inch AMOLED display, up to 1TB storage, and a 200-megapixel main camera, measuring only 4mm thick when unfolded. Motorola launched the Moto Razr 60 Ultra featuring a premium leather back, a 4-inch external display, and a 7-inch internal display. Huawei launched Mate XT, a triple-folding smartphone with a Z-shaped folding mechanism. Google released Pixel 9 Pro Fold with a premium matte glass back.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 Review: 3 Reasons To Buy, 2 To Skip
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the Nord CE 5 smartphone in India, priced at Rs 24,999. The Nord CE 5 features a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 APEX chip, a 7100mAh battery, and a 6.77-inch AMOLED 120Hz display. It also includes OxygenOS 15.0 based on Android 15 with AI features.

articles.title: Deals & Giveaways: Toothpaste Purchase Offers Kitchenware & Toiletries
articles.author: Senior Editor
articles.summary: Baijia is launching a gift-with-purchase campaign offering home goods with toothpaste purchases. The offering includes a mini rice cooker, a frying pan, and other products, valued at over $1,200. This campaign aims to attract new buyers and reward loyal customers with added value, focusing on consumer desire for added value.

articles.title: Six appeal: Hyundai Ioniq 6 N, the motorsport-inspired, drift-friendly performance EV that's ready for the school run
articles.author: David Roy
articles.summary: Hyundai launched the Ioniq 6 N, a sports saloon EV, at the Goodwood Festival of Speed. The Ioniq 6 N features performance enhancements like redesigned suspension, improved N e-Shift virtual gear selection, and N Grin Boost. It boasts 600bhp and can sprint from 0-62mph in 3.2 seconds, featuring an 84kWh battery with a revamped management system.

articles.title: TC&C Receives Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Global New Product Innovation Recognition for Real-Time Deepfake Detection
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: TC&C has launched Deepfake Guard, a platform designed for real-time deepfake detection in enterprise communications, using multimodal detection and dynamic response capabilities. The platform integrates with systems like Microsoft Teams and Zoom, offering deployment flexibility across cloud, on-premises, and mobile infrastructures. Frost & Sullivan recognized Deepfake Guard with the 2025 Global New Product Innovation Recognition.

articles.title: Samsung confirms its tri-fold phone is coming this year – even though it missed Unpacked
articles.author: Rik Henderson
articles.summary: Samsung is developing a tri-fold smartphone, potentially named Galaxy G Fold, with a planned launch before the end of 2025. The device, currently in production, boasts a 9.96-inch display when unfolded and its design has been previewed in a roadmap and beta version of One UI 8.0.

articles.title: TC&C Receives Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Global New Product Innovation Recognition for Real-Time Deepfake Detection
articles.author: Frost
articles.summary: TC&C's Deepfake Guard platform received the 2025 Global New Product Innovation Recognition from Frost & Sullivan for its real-time deepfake detection capabilities. Deepfake Guard offers enterprise-grade protection against synthetic media threats through innovation, scalability, and customer-focused design.

articles.title: Heat Advisory from WED 10:00 AM CDT until WED 7:00 PM CDT
articles.author: Frost
articles.summary: TC&C launched Deepfake Guard, a real-time, enterprise-grade platform designed to protect against AI-driven impersonation in live interactions across audio, video, images, and text. Deepfake Guard proactively neutralizes AI-driven impersonation in live interactions across audio, video, images, and text, assessing the authenticity of the communication itself. The platform integrates seamlessly with Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and TC&C’s own compliance stack and is designed for use in financial services, healthcare, and customer contact centers.

articles.title: Absa unveils game-changing business banking card
articles.author: Katlego Rantsho Zandile Mbuya
articles.summary: Absa Bank Botswana has launched a new card offering for businesses. Keletso Setimela, Absa Bank Botswana Business banking director, described the card as a 'game-changer', suggesting it is an innovative offering supporting growth in the digital economy.

articles.title: Aspira Nigeria expands dental care range with launch of New Oracare+Red Gel Toothpaste
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Aspira Nigeria Ltd. has launched Oracare+ Red Gel Toothpaste, a new variant in their hygiene and personal care product line.

articles.title: Glo, Samsung unveil Galaxy Fold 7, Flip 7 with free data, N1.2m Gifts
articles.author: Daily Trust
articles.summary: Globacom and Samsung have launched a pre-order offer for the new Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 smartphones in Nigeria. The unveiling event took place at Globacom's headquarters in Lagos.

articles.title: 800.com Launches Enhanced Caller ID
articles.summary: 800.com launched Enhanced Caller ID, a service providing real-time caller information, including name, address, and number, upon receiving calls or texts. This service allows businesses to prioritize calls, avoid spam, access additional contact details, export caller information, and identify potential spam calls.

articles.title: G-Assist Plugin Contest: Win a Prize by Developing a Tool
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NVIDIA has introduced the G-Assist platform along with the ChatGPT Plugin Builder, which simplifies the development of custom AI agents by automatically generating necessary plugin code. This system allows for rapid prototyping and deployment of AI agents, and NVIDIA provides resources such as a technical blog and a hackathon to support developers in utilizing these tools and contributing to the AI ecosystem.

articles.title: Honor X70 Unveiled: 8300 mAh Battery and Pricing Details
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Honor has launched the Honor X70 smartphone featuring a colossal 8300 mAh battery. The X70 includes a 6.78-inch FHD+ LCD display with a 90Hz refresh rate, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 5G chipset, and a 50MP main camera. It is currently available in China with a global rollout expected in the coming months.

articles.title: 2025 Mercedes-Benz C-Class flagship gets thousands in extra kit for $100 more
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse these deals to potentially find advantageous offers.

articles.title: Primebook Bets On Deep Tech Stack To Stand Out In India's Budget Laptop Market
articles.author: Kashish Saxena
articles.summary: Primebook is launching affordable laptops with its in-house operating system, PrimeOS, which is based on Android Open Source. Primebook integrates a system-level AI layer, and is experimenting with hybrid laptops that run PrimeOS locally but can access cloud-based Windows or Linux environments and is also offering cloud PC access for a monthly subscription.

articles.title: 27 Easy Cleaning Products If You Live Alone
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff's Miracle Multipurpose Cleaner Spray and The Pink Stuff paste are highlighted as effective cleaning solutions for various surfaces. Clorox offers a toilet cleaning system with disposable sponges, aiming to simplify and sanitize toilet cleaning. Additionally, other cleaning products such as dishwasher cleaning tablets, a squeegee broom, and Goo Gone degreaser are recommended for maintaining a clean household.

articles.title: 36 Home Products Future You Will Be Over The Moon That You Bought
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Oxo launched the compact Brew Rapid Brewer, an affordable and faster portable cold brew maker. New products include the Deli ProKeeper for consolidating deli drawers, a hybrid berry basket and colander for cleaning fruits, and a corduroy foldable sleeper chair for limited spaces.

articles.title: OLIVE YOUNG Highlights Private Label Brands at Cosmoprof North America 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: OLIVE YOUNG, a South Korean beauty retailer, presented its award-winning private label brands at Cosmoprof North America 2025. The event served as a platform to introduce these Korean beauty innovations to buyers and industry partners.

articles.title: G-DRAGON And LINE FRIENDS Collaborate To Create ‘ZO&FRIENDS'
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: G-DRAGON and LINE FRIENDS are collaborating to launch a new brand line, 'ZO&FRIENDS'. G-DRAGON developed the characters for the new brand. The launch is planned for this summer.

articles.title: Hyundai Motor launches upgraded ST1 electric van with new features, budget trim
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: On Wednesday, July 16, Hyundai Motor Co. launched an upgraded model.

articles.title: Zoom rolls out new agentic AI offerings to save time and drive connections
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Zoom Communications introduced new agentic AI capabilities. These capabilities are designed to help users complete tasks.

articles.title: Brand First: How Retailers Win Hearts, Wallets & The Algorithm
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Generative AI is transforming the digital shopping experience. It introduces conversational product search, offering customers a more interactive and personalized way to find products.

articles.title: Morrisons shoppers question 'who signed this off?' as new store feature revealed
articles.author: York Press
articles.summary: Morrisons has introduced 'cleaning robots' in its stores. This deployment has prompted reactions from shoppers who shared their confusion on social media.

articles.title: Hyundai Motor IONIQ 6 N Debuts at Goodwood Festival of Speed, Setting New Benchmark for High-Performance EVs
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor Company unveiled the IONIQ 6 N at the Goodwood Festival of Speed. This marks a pivotal milestone for Hyundai N.

articles.title: Veranex Unveils MedTech's First Innovation CRO (iCRO)—Redefining R&D in a Capital‑Tight Market
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Veranex, a product development and contract research services company, has introduced its Innovation CRO service.

articles.title: Dyson Has Launched Its Most Innovative Hair Tool Yet
articles.author: Sheerluxe
articles.summary: Dyson launched a new product that is lightweight, compact and engineered for performance.
